front.div:
Abstract: A series of solutions for camera, graphics and
display applications have been developed in order to create a full
high dynamic range imaging pipeline. Every element of this
pipeline features very high contrast, brightness and amplitude
resolution as well as compatibility with existing infrastructure. A
brief description of the capture, storage/process and display
technology is provided as well as an outline of benefits of the
combined system. Relevant performance metrics and comparison
standards with other devices are also discussed.
